About

Hey… I am Abhijeet Gupta , a second year undergraduate in Computer Science and Engineering at Indian Institute of Information Technology, Nagpur.I am an ACM-ICPC Regionalist and also Head-Covener of Dotslash Programming Community of IIIT Nagpur.

I am keenly interested in Data Structures, Algorithms and Competitive programming. I love participating in online coding contests at Codechef and Codeforces.

For more details on the academic front, have a look at my resume and profiles in links given.
